== Bio ==
Dan works at CSC Finland and is appointed by NeIC as project leader for
the Glenna cloud computing project. the objective of the Glenna project
is to share knowledge, set best practices on managing cloud services and
to create a Nordic federated cloud service. The vision is that once a
Nordic federated cloud service is in place Nordic researchers could run
their experiments and manage their data on any Nordic Cloud resource.
